description: Use this tool to find available trip IDs for a given route and date. It requires departure city, arrival city, and a date (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: from_city_id
parameters.description: The ID of the departure city.

parameters.name: to_city_id
parameters.description: The ID of the arrival city.

parameters.name: departure_date
parameters.description: The date of the trip in YYYY-MM-DD format.

description: Use this tool when the user asks for more details about a specific trip and you already know the trip_id. It provides full details like departure/arrival times, bus info, and available seats.

parameters.name: trip_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the trip.

description: Use this tool to get a list of all available cities for trip booking.
Use this tool to get a full list of currently available trips, including departure/arrival times, bus details, and available seats.
